pkgmetadata.longdescription: Estimating a (c)DCC-GARCH Model in Large Dimensions // Functions for Estimating a (c)DCC-GARCH Model in large dimensions based on a publication by Engle et,al (2017) doi:10.1080/07350015.2017.1345683 and Nakagawa et,al (2018) doi:10.3390/ijfs6020052. This estimation method is consist of composite likelihood method by Pakel et al. (2014) http://paneldataconference2015.ceu.hu/Program/Cavit-Pakel.pdf and (Non-)linear shrinkage estimation of covariance matrices by Ledoit and Wolf (2004,2015,2016). (doi:10.1016/S0047-259X(03)00096-4, doi:10.1214/12-AOS989, doi:10.1016/j.jmva.2015.04.006).
